meta.title: Brat Generator - Create Professional Brat Style Images
meta.description: Create professional Brat style images with our free generator. Choose from multiple themes including green, black, white, and blue. Customize text and generate high-quality images instantly.
meta.keywords: brat generator, brat style, image generator, text effects, custom images

generator.title: Create Your Brat Image
generator.tip: Tip: You can also take a screenshot to save the image

step1.title: Enter Text
step1.description: Type the text you want to display in the text box

step2.title: Choose Theme
step2.description: Select a style you like from our available themes

step3.title: Save Image
step3.description: Click the "Save Image" button or take a screenshot to save your creation

gallery.title: Style Examples
gallery.description: Check out these different Brat style examples with various themes. Create your own by using our generator above.
